com.viaoa.object

Class OACascade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.object.OACascade

  • public class OACascade
extends Object
    Used for cascading methods, to be able to know if an object has already been visited. Since this is used for recursive visitors, it could cause stack overflows. To handle this, there is a depth that can be used. When/if the max depth is reached, then objects can be added to an array and then restarted once the stack unwinding is done.
    Author:
    vvia
